title: Ball Toss Puzzle
description: Toss all of the balls onto the board to fill up all of the spaces. Think ahead to make sure the entire board gets filled. Tap on the red balls to move them onto the board, if a space is filled the balls will jump over and fill the next space. Try to complete all 50 levels in this fun brain teaser online puzzle game.
instructions: instructions in the game

title: Spot The Differences
description: Spot the Differences is a fun brain teaser game where you have to find what's different between two near-identical real photographs! Each pair has 5 differing details, and your job is to find them all.
instructions: you have to find what's different between two near-identical real photographs

title: Triple Jack
description: Triple Jack is a version of Black Jack where you can make three stacks on the playing field. The combo meter rises every time you get 21. Go over 21 and you are bust. Bust three times and it's game over.
instructions:
Try to match up until 21 points, and aim for a Black or Triple Jack!
All face cards have a value of 10, except for the Ace, which is worth 1 or 11 points.
If you go over 21, you are busted! If you get busted more than 2 times, you will lose the game.

title: Monster Trucks Coloring Pages
description: This is coloring game where you can color eight different monster trucks. Color this trucks as you want and try to get the best photo. You can save the colored image and to print later if you want. Definitely is interesting kids coloring game. Click on some image and enjoy the game.
instructions: Use mouse to color.

title: Penguin Adventure
description: Penguin Adventure is a puzzle game where you need to control the penguin to collect all diamonds and to unfreeze his girlfriend.There are nine levels in this game and every level is much harder than before. So you need to tap on penguin and drag for power. Watch from spikes because they will hurt the penguin. There are also fire balls and other creatures who can hurt the penguin. Try to pass all levels and to enjoy this puzzle game. You can continue from last time if you play this game again.
instructions: Tap on screen to play this game.

title: Geometric Solids
description:
Geometric Solids

Learn various geometric solids in a fun way with the game Geometric Solids.

Game developed by:

Nau.kids


Geometric Solids

Learn various geometric solids in a fun way with the game Geometric Solids.

Game developed by:

Nau.kids
instructions: Click on the figure for the corresponding solid.

title: Wagons Jigsaw
description: Wagons Jigsaw is game with images that contains wagon cars in it. You need to choose one image to play. Choose your mode that you wanna play there is 3 modes, easy, medium or hard. Drag the pieces in right position to get the image with Wagon Car. You have unlimited time to play this game, so start to play and enjoy in your free time.
instructions: Use mouse or finger to drag the pieces.

title: Kings and Queens Solitaire Tripeaks
description:
It’s a grand time to harvest some solitaire fun! If you enjoy card games and the words Pyramid, Klondike, Spider mean something to you, or even if you’re just on the verge of discovering solitaire puzzles, Kings & Queens welcome you on your journey! This beautiful tripeaks saga has a lot to offer.

Become an honorable member of Kings & Queens club and enjoy its never-ending perks: – Savor picturesque landscapes while solving challenging puzzles! – Complete countless tri peaks levels to become the solitaire master! – Learn the sophisticated art of playing the wildcards and use it to your advantage! – Try to keep up with mischievous magic cards and to pick enchanted locks! – Uncover hidden golden treasures and collect priceless rubies on your journey!

OTHER FEATURES ALSO INCLUDE: ● Global leaderboard - compete with players around the world; ● Constant fun - daily quests, events, activities, challenges, and rewards; ● Play anywhere - continue the game on any platform everywhere with automatically saved game progress; ● Free Solitaire - Kings & Queens is an absolutely free-to-play online tripeaks solitaire puzzle with an option to make some purchases.

It’s easy to learn and hard to let go of! Get ready for your journey into the world of tripeaks solitaire puzzles together with Kings & Queens!
instructions: Collect all the cards!

title: Goblin Fight Match 3
description: Goblin Fight Match 3 – this cool game three in a row, in which you have to put the blocks of the same color in a series of three pieces or more to achieve the highest possible score, be careful to account the scale to the left did not fall too low, otherwise the game will be over. Enjoy the game!
instructions: Use your mouse to play the game or tap on the screen!

title: Cute Girl Jigsaw Puzzle
description: Cute Girl Jigsaw Puzzle is fun online game for kids and you can play it for free. Play this game in your browser or mobile device. Dora the Explorer never stops adventuring, and now her adventures have taken her into jigsaw puzzles! With this game, extra large, shaped floor puzzle even some of her littlest fans can join the fun. Have fun playing and come back for more.
instructions: Mouse or tap to play.

title: Dino Fossil
description:
Dino Fossil - kids game

With the game Dino Fossil discover the differences in fossils between different dinosaurs in a fun way.

Game developed by:
Nau.kids
instructions: Click on the dinosaur corresponding to your fossil.

title: Sultan Match
description: Sultan Match is classic matching game where you need to connect 3 or more same objects and to earn points. You need to do some points if you want to go to the next level. Watch on time and try to get the point, to pass the level. Try to pass all twelve levels and to enjoy in this game.
instructions: Tap and drag on screen to play

title: Foody Memory
description: Click the cards to reveal a food icon . Memorize it so that you can match to similar cards. Match all of the cards on the board to complete the level.
instructions: Use mouse or touch pad to play this game.

title: Mother Duck and Ducklings Jigsaw
description: Duck Mother and Ducklings Jigsaw, in this fun game we enter the world of mothers and ducks. These cute baby ducks never leave their mothers, so put together all the pieces of the puzzl. 12 different puzzles, 12 different duck families are waiting for you.
instructions: Left Click or Touch

title: Knight War Coloring
description: Knight War Coloring is a free online coloring and kids game! In this game you will find eight different pictures which have to be colored as fast as you can to obtain a great score at the end of the game. You have 23 different colors to choose. You can also save the colored image. Have fun!
instructions: Use your mouse to play the game or tap on the screen.

title: Number Shapes
description: With the Number Shapes app, learn numbers in a fun way.
instructions: Drag the right number to its place.

title: Dino Party Jigsaw
description: Dinosaurs have organized a party, the birthday party of the youngest dinosaur will take place here today, would you like to join this fun party and do some great puzzlers? 12 different pictures were taken at the party and they were put into a puzzle, everyone is confident in your abilities. Connect the pieces, make the dinosaurs happy.
instructions: Left Click or Touch

title: Easy Kids Coloring Tractor
description: Easy Kids Coloring Tractor is an online game that you can play for free. Children's world is always full of imagination. Easy Kids Coloring Tractor is a great coloring game suitable for all ages. There are various tractor patterns drawn in the game, but these patterns have no colors. You need to fill these patterns with various colors. If you have a certain art talent, come and use magic to fill in various patterns with colors, and finally take pictures of these art works and show others your art ability. Have fun and come back for more free games.
instructions: Mouse or tap to play.

title: Line Driver
description: Line Driver is game where you need to control the car in to narrow line road. The road is with corners and you need to be careful. Collect some coins to earn extra points. Try not to crash and drive longer as you can.
instructions: Use mouse to control the car.

title: Ice Cream Jigsaw
description: What is the favorite food of summer days? Of course, ice cream prepared with great sauces. There are many ice creams that you will like in this puzzle game created with great graphics. How would you like to eat your ice cream? There are 12 different puzzles and 12 different ice creams in this game for you. Let's put all the pieces together.
instructions: Left Click or Touch

title: Fruit Monster
description:
Fruit Monster game for kids.

With the Fruit Monster game, learn the name of various fruits in a fun way on your phone, tablet or computer.

Game developed by:
Nau.kids
instructions: Drag the fruit into the monster's mouth.

title: Mr Jack vs Zombies
description: Mr Jack vs Zombies is a fun puzzle and shooter game. This game has the best physics shooter game there is. Play Mr Jack vs Zombies now to have a great time!
instructions: Tap to shoot

title: Truck Drift
description: Truck Drift is game where you need to do some drifts with your truck. On the start you can choose the speed that truck will drive. Our recommendation is to start with given speed of 90 mph and if you want you can increase the speed later in the game. Try to pass more circles in stage as you can before crash.
instructions: Tap on screen to control the truck.

title: Hidden Cute Animals
description: Can you find all cute animals hidden on the image? Beware, many of them look similar, and you have limited time. Try to get maximum number of stars on each of 16 levels.
instructions: Tap on the correct image on the scene. If you get stuck, you can use hint, or zoom the image (by clicking on the magnifying glass icon. Click again the icon to turn the zoom off).

title: Sudoku Classic
description: Sudoku is played on a grid of 9 x 9 spaces. Within the rows and columns are 9 “squares” (made up of 3 x 3 spaces). Each row, column and square (9 spaces each) needs to be filled out with the numbers 1-9, without repeating any numbers within the row, column or square. LofGames made a very easy user interface and many more feature for you to enjoy the classical SUDOKU game.
instructions: Use mouse or touch pad to play this game.

title: Hidden Objects Insects
description: This is a classic point and click hidden object game.  You need to find all of the items listed in the picture on the left side of the screen.  Complete the level before time runs out to get bonus points.
instructions: Use mouse or touch pad to find hidden objects.

title: Cute Girl Coloring Book
description: Cute Girl Coloring Book is online coloring game suitable for all ages. Cute Girl known as Dora The Explorer is one of the most recognizable cartoon characters today. In this game choose one of the images and make a master piece. Let your imagination flow. When done print the image and show it to your friends and parents. Have fun coloring.
instructions: Mouse or tap to play.

title: Racing Cars Jigsaw Challenge
description:
Racing Cars Jigsaw Challenge is a online game that you can play for free. Racing Cars Jigsaw Challenge is from the genre of puzzle and jigsaw games. Do you like Racing Cars? Let's try this nice jigsaw game about it! There are 12 images for you to choose from. Your mission is to drag the pieces to its original position. The game has no time limitation. Just play it for free.
.Have fun playing and come back for more free games.
instructions: Tap on the computer or touch the screen on your mobile phone

title: Super Jewel Collapse
description: It is a challenging block collapse game. In each level you will get a unique challenge. You have to complete the challenge in allowed number of turns. If you do in less turns, you will got good bonus points. Complete 45 levels to win this game.
instructions: Use mouse or touch the block groups to play this game.

title: Let's Catch
description: Let's Catch is super addictive puzzle game with  Minimalistic & Elegantly designed approach,which lets you think out of the box and sharpen your mind.The Goal is to drag n merge the same numbered blocks. The challenge increases gradually with large numbered blocks.You get to enjoy this amazing new puzzle game while improving your memory, concentration levels and reflexes at the same time.
instructions: Drag n merge the same numbered blocks

title: Chameleon Want Eat
description: Feed the Chameleon with different insects. The Chameleon will change the color and that is the easiest way to eat insects with the same color. Tap on the screen to rotate the Chameleon and to eat insects.
instructions: Tap on screen to play

title: My Car Jigsaw
description:
Fantastic Jigsaw game with car adventure.
Drag and drop the picture pieces to their exact locations . Use mouse or touch pad to drag the piece of image and drop it to its exact location.
instructions: Use mouse or touch screen to play this game.

title: Little Princess Jigsaw
description: Beautiful princesses came together for you in this game. They are eagerly waiting for you to put the pieces together and complete the pictures. If you get confused there is a magic button find it and click it, all the pieces will come together and your job will be easier. Let's explore together in this game, the graceful princess dressed in 12 wonderful dresses.
instructions: Left Click or Touch

title: Kids Superheroes Memory
description: Kids Superheroes Memory is a free online game from genre of memory and monsters truck games. Flip the tiles and try to match them up in pairs. Pair up all the tiles to win. Try to complete the game in as few moves as possible! There are is 4 levels. Use mouse to click or tap to screen on the squares. Concentrate yourself and start to play. Enjoy!
instructions: Use your mouse to play the game or tap on the screen!

title: Cute Unicorns And Dragons Puzzle
description: Missing the puzzles? Fabulous cute unicorns and dragons will not let you get bored! Discover the wonderful world of fantasy, collect all the pictures with magic dragons and wonderful unicorns!
instructions: Left mouse button or touch.

title: Quick Dice
description: Quick Dice is fun board game to play. In front of your screen, a playing field will appear with various visible colored dots. Your opponents in this game are few. The moves in the game are done in order of priority. First you need to roll special dice and certain numbers will fall on them. Number mean how many moves you will need to make. Then, you will pass along the game map and light a specific point. Your goal is to fill most of the playing field with dots of your color.So heave fun!
instructions: Use your mouse to play the game or tap on the screen!

title: Sweet Girl and Bear Memory Challenge
description: Sweer Girl and Bear Memory Challenge is a version of a famous game of Memory. You can play this fun game in your browser or any mobile device. Train your mind with Masha and The Bear and enjoy with this beautiful game. You can game alone or you can challenge a friend. You can select four level of difficulty. Have fun playing and come back for more free games.
instructions: Mouse or tap to play.

title: Blocks Up
description: Blocks Up is a fun online puzzle game. Match 3 blocks of the same color. Don’t let the blocks reach the dotted line! Have fun and enjoy with Blocks Up game.
instructions: Use mouse or tap to screen to play this game!

title: Animal Firetrucks Match 3
description: Animal Firetrucks Match 3 – this cool game three in a row, in which you have to put the blocks of the same color in a series of three pieces or more to achieve the highest possible score, be careful to account the scale to the left did not fall too low, otherwise the game will be over. Enjoy the game!
instructions: Use your mouse to play the game or tap on the screen!

title: 2048 Drop
description: This is a game based on 2048 game and drop game. The tiles with number will drop from the top.When tiles of the same number collide with eachother, they will combine into one tile carrying the sum of two tiles.If the broad is filled and no place for a new title, game over. This a game need player's reaction capacity, operational capability and placement capacity. The rule of 2048 and drop game are very simple, but the mix of them is not easy.Let's try the game and get as more score as you can.
instructions:
Slide the tiles left or right and tap the screen to drop the tiles.
Move the tile to the side or upon the same number tile.
